titleStmt.title: The younger brother, or, The amorous jilt a comedy : acted at the Theatre Royal by His Majesty's servants / written by the late ingenious Mrs. A. Behn ; with some account of her life.
titleStmt.author: Behn, Aphra, 1640-1689.
Gildon, Charles, 1665-1724.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for J. Harris ... and sold by R. Baldwin ...,

notesStmt.note: "Epistle dedicatory" and "An account of the life of the imcomparable Mrs. Behn" signed: Ch. Gildon.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
